introduction.title: Technical Director
introduction.tagline: Holds a unique mix of high-level systems engineering and hands-on experience managing engineering teams, for the development and delivery of software and hardware based products.
introduction.description: A forward thinking services team manager who played a key role in the development of one of Deloitte’s Canadian Technology Fast 50 Company’s by using 5+ years of software engineering and project management experience. An impressive problem solver with strong presentation skills, and a proven track record of dependable technical leadership and management.
competencies: International project experience as a chairman of a global engineering committee.
Excels in a fast-paced and flexible work environments.
Ability to wear many hats in a single organization – from a problem-solving engineer to a customer-facing marketer.
Can manage simultaneous time-sensitive projects with numerous stakeholders.

company_achievements: Built a front-end development team from the ground up.
Successfully delivered 2, $100k development projects in 4 months.
Started the company’s first R&D Department.
Instigated a key department responding to the Sales, Marketing, and Engineering Directors developing new rapid prototype designs.
Promoted within 5 months to supporting Tier One customers with Linux Application support.
Managed and completed simultaneous software engineering projects.
Critical team member in the company’s largest production win.
Fast-tracked to work on the highest profile project in the company as a Systems Design Specialist.
Received excellent reviews 2 years in a row
North American representative for the International Young Professionals Board.
Identified as an important up-and-comer in the organization.

skills: Works well as an individual and in a team.
